channel.title: RSPS Directory
channel.description:
I have recently developed an RSPS listings site on the web. I need people to add their RSPS to it. There is currently no advertising on the site (but can be added at request). Images and/or banners may be submitted.
The site currently has no listings on it yet but I am looking to make it grow. If you are interested in adding your site to [i]The RSPS Directory[/i] just email me at * or reply to this discussion! Please be patient as your listing will be added within 24hours.
(the website is still under development so what you see is only a temporary design until I get more RSPS listings)
Oh, by the way, the site is *

item.title: RSPS Directory
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You need to get permission from a global moderator+ before you can post this, if you happen to get permission, private message me with proof and I’ll unlock this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Directory
item.dc:creator: @jis2507 jis2507
item.description:
@jis2507 wrote:

Si Force:

You have to get all/any sites approved by a staff member before you can post them, it does not matter if it is not a private server, it is involved with them.

oh ok. Sorry I wasn’t aware. How do I go about aproving the site by a staff member. I can’t find any. How would I go about finding and telling one.

Read full topic
